trans-unit.source: Provides an abstract base class for all management query objects.
trans-unit.target: 提供抽象基底類別 (Base Class) 給所有管理查詢物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns a copy of the object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件的複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The query string to be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 要剖析的查詢字串。

trans-unit.source: Parses the query string and sets the property values accordingly.
trans-unit.target: 剖析查詢字串，並相應的設定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: If the query is valid, the class name property and condition property of the query will be parsed.
trans-unit.target: 如果查詢有效，便會剖析查詢的類別名稱屬性及 Condition 屬性。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: The following example parses a query into class name and condition properties.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會將查詢剖析為類別名稱] 和 [條件屬性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the query language used in the query string, defining the format of the query string.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定使用於查詢字串中的查詢語言，定義查詢字串的格式。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> value containing the format of the query string.
trans-unit.target: 傳回 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值，包含查詢字串的格式。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: Can be set to any supported query language.
trans-unit.target: 可以設定為任何支援的查詢語言。

trans-unit.source: "WQL" is the only value supported intrinsically by WMI.
trans-unit.target: 「 WQL 」 是 WMI 在本質上支援的唯一值。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。

trans-unit.source: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.
trans-unit.target: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using Libraries from Partially Trusted Code](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[從部分信任程式碼使用程式庫](~/docs/framework/misc/using-libraries-from-partially-trusted-code.md)。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the query in text format.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定文字格式的查詢。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> value containing the query.
trans-unit.target: 傳回包含查詢的 <see cref="T:System.String" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: Property Value
trans-unit.target: 屬性值

trans-unit.source: If the query object is constructed with no parameters, the property is null until specifically set.
trans-unit.target: 查詢物件的建構不含任何參數，如果屬性為 null，直到明確設定。

trans-unit.source: If the object was constructed with a specified query, the property returns the specified query string.
trans-unit.target: 如果物件以指定的查詢建構，則屬性會傳回指定的查詢字串。

trans-unit.source: .NET Framework Security
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework 安全性

trans-unit.source: Full trust for the immediate caller.
trans-unit.target: 完全信任立即呼叫者。
